/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene below. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, going about their day under the watchful eye of the sun. The image is a snapshot of life in motion, a moment frozen in time on a busy street in Beijing.
